contents.text: Welcome to Mozilla in San Francisco, where we keep the Internet open and accessible for everyone.
For developer resources and support, press 1.
To get help with Firefox Developer Edition, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a developer support specialist.

navigationGoals: Fix a crash issue in Firefox Developer Edition with a support specialist
I’m developing a veterans support website and need help with Firefox Developer Edition.
I need to debug an extension compatibility issue in my Firefox Developer Edition setup.
I need help setting up Firefox Developer Edition on my home computer.
I need help configuring Firefox Developer Edition to run my WebGL physics simulations smoothly.

contents.text: To access MDN Web Docs and API references, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to the documentation help desk.

navigationGoals: Retrieve the web authentication API reference from MDN Web Docs
I need to access MDN Web Docs for API references for my JavaScript project.
I have a question about the WebSockets API example on MDN Web Docs.
I want guidance using MDN Web Docs to learn basic web development.
I’m looking for the MDN Web Docs reference on the WebGL API for 3D rendering in my physics project.

contents.text: For information about Mozilla’s mission and career opportunities, press 2.
To learn about our mission and values, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our outreach team.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of Mozilla’s mission and values
I want to learn about Mozilla’s mission and values.
I’d like details on Mozilla’s open-source governance framework and advocacy.
I’d like to learn about Mozilla’s mission and values and how I can support their work.
I’d like to learn how Mozilla’s mission supports open science and web standards for research.

contents.text: To explore career opportunities at Mozilla, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our recruiting department.

navigationGoals: Learn about current engineering job openings at Mozilla
As a veteran, I’m interested in exploring career opportunities at Mozilla.
I want to inquire about the Senior JavaScript Engineer position on the Firefox performance team.
I’m interested in exploring career opportunities at Mozilla, especially for someone my age.
I’m interested in exploring internship opportunities at Mozilla’s developer department.
